#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType HoleQualificationUSGA.

== Name ==

HoleQualificationUSGA (complexType)

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--HoleQualificationUSGA (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Qualify a golf course played from a set of tees according to the USGA rules.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...>  (rating ; slope) </...>
}}}
----

|| [SCourseRating.html golfml:CourseRating] || [SCourseRating.html rating] ||  					Course rating of a set of tees according to USGA specifications.				 ||
|| [SCourseSlope.html golfml:CourseSlope] || [SCourseSlope.html slope] ||  					Slope of a set of tees according to USGA specifications.				 ||
